short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the real story - cut through bias, misinformation & sensationalism.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The AI news reading browser extension that helps you...

-‍ Find news you can trust by learning about the outlet
‍- Strip emotional language with short summaries
‍- Reveal biases and logical fallacies
- Maintain perspective with counter arguments
- Restore context with historical recaps
- Take action with list of suggested non-profits
